transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good afternoon Vanshika baat kar rahi hu Indiamart se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Sir Indiamart se baat kar rahi hu Vanshika sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir service regarding ke liye kiya tha kaisa chal raha hai business Indiamart se?
Customer: Abhi haan na sir wo aapko ek 10 minute mein call karta hu ye aapka hi number hai kya?
Executive: Ji ji mera hi number hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asked about business with IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Customer said he will call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- service, business, call back
